column5: This scenic room on the second floor is perfect for a single person. The room includes a full bed, nightstand, chest of drawers, mirror, large portable closet, and great view of backyard. It also includes access to a shared bathroom with a Jacuzzi bathtub.   Our guests have access to a large kitchen, refrigerator (used exclusively by Airbnb guests), dining room, living room, billiard room, library, study, and scenic backyard as well as DVDs, CDs, records, books and board games.
column8: Scenic Room in Tranquil Home near The Woodlands
